spatial_accuracy.notes: Overall layout roughly resembles a 2-bed unit with central living/dining and bedrooms left/right, but multiple plan-critical mismatches exist. (E2/E4) Entry/foyer zone shown in 2D (foyer + defined entry passage) is not preserved; 3D entry reads as a more open direct connection into living/dining. (E2/E3) Toilet locations/access do not match: the 2D plan has a clear common toilet near Bed-2 side and an attached toilet for Bed-1 near the top-right; in 3D the bathroom cluster is shifted/organized differently and the Bed-1 attachment is not clearly respected. (E1/E2) Utility room placement at bottom-left (adjacent to kitchen) is not represented as a distinct room in 3D. (E2) Balcony/deck connections are approximated but their depths/threshold placement and adjacent wall breaks do not precisely follow the 2D plan. (E4) Room proportions are noticeably altered (kitchen/entry/circulation widths and bathroom block sizing).

structural_fidelity.notes: Wall masses are clean and consistent, but plan fidelity is weak. (E1) Utility room (5' x 7'8") is missing as a separate enclosed space. (E1/E2) Foyer (4'6" x 3'8") and the defined entry corridor geometry in the 2D plan are not faithfully modeled. (E2) Adjacency relationships for toilets are incorrect/unclear: Bed-1 should have an attached toilet directly accessed from Bed-1; 3D shows a shifted bathroom arrangement that reads more like a shared/central bath. (E5) Extra/altered internal partitions around the living/TV/sofa zone appear that are not in the 2D wall layout, changing circulation and wall alignment. Door embeddings are present but do not consistently match the 2D door positions/orientations.

furniture_mapping.notes: Major furniture types are present (two beds, sofa, dining table, kitchen counters), but mapping is only approximate. (E2) Living seating/TV partitioning does not correspond to the 2D suggested arrangement and constrains space differently. (E4) Some furniture scale vs room sizes (especially dining-to-kitchen/entry clearance) appears inconsistent with the 2D plan’s proportions.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Render is visually clear with clean geometry and generally good lighting. Camera is a top-down axonometric/isometric-like view but not a strict orthographic isometric match to the 2D plan (minor perspective feel). Walls/floors are clean with minimal artifacts; composition is readable.

detected_errors.description: Utility room (bottom-left adjacent to kitchen in 2D) is missing as a distinct enclosed room in the 3D render.
Foyer/entry space shown in 2D is not represented as a clearly defined foyer in the 3D render.
Bathroom/toilet block placement differs from 2D; toilets appear shifted/reorganized relative to bedrooms and living.
Door placements do not consistently match the 2D plan, especially around the bathroom(s) and entry/foyer area.
Intended attached access for Bed-1 toilet is not clearly preserved (reads as a more central/shared access rather than an attached ensuite as in 2D).
Balcony/deck thresholds and adjacent wall openings are approximated and do not precisely align with 2D deck placements and widths.
Proportions of circulation, kitchen/entry zone, and bathroom block are distorted compared to the 2D plan dimensions.
Additional/altered internal partitions near the living/sofa/TV zone appear that are not present in the 2D wall layout.
Window/opening placements are not verifiable as matching the 2D plan; several exterior wall openings appear simplified/shifted.
